description:
E-learning platform Moodle is a web application that allows the creation of virtual classrooms for managing online courses. The use of virtual classrooms is an important source of support to face, blended or online teaching, being the space through which teachers design their teaching materials and activities to facilitate their students, and to communicate and conduct evaluations. This MOOC addresses basic questions about setting up and managing a virtual classroom for teaching purposes. 
 
By its status of free software, Moodle is constantly updated. In this course we will work with version 2.7 of the platform. However, if you have another version 2.x you can keep the contents in most cases. To participate in this MOOC no previous knowledge is required, since it is a course in basic knowledge of Moodle that lets you configure a virtual classroom for teaching purposes, post or link to content, set up activities and correct, or managing communication with students. This MOOC is composed of eight modules and will have two months.
title: E-Learning: Aulas virtuales en Moodle para uso docente
instructors: David Cabrera Primo, Adrián Rodríguez Vargas, Mª Belén San Nicolás Santos and Alberto Rodríguez Orihuela
